name: topiary-ui
description: Development repo for the topiary-io admin UI

scripts.dev: npm run watch & npm run styles && fg
scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets es2015 --plugins [mjsx transform-object-rest-spread] ] src/index.js -o data/bundle.js && stylus -u jeet src/styles/main.styl -o data/main.css
scripts.watch: watchify -vd -t [ babelify --presets es2015 --plugins [mjsx transform-object-rest-spread] ] src/index.js -o data/bundle.js
scripts.min: uglifyjs data/bundle.js --screw-ie8 -c dead_code -o data/bundle.min.js && cleancss data/main.css -o data/main.min.css
